description: Quotients of consecutive values of lcm {1, 3, 5 ...,2n-1} or A025547(n+1)/A025547(n).
comments: a(n)=GCD( C(2n+1,1),C(2n+2,2),...,C(3n,n) ) where C(n,k)=binomial(n,k). - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 31 2003a(n) = greatest common divisor of entries of zigzag matrix Z(n), as defined in A088961. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 25 2013
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to lcm's
mathematica: Table[Cyclotomic[2n+1,1],{n,90}]  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 02 2011 *)#[[2]]/#[[1]]&/@Partition[Table[LCM@@Range[1,2n+1,2],{n,0,80}],2,1] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 04 2013 *)
prog: (Haskell)a051417 n = a051417_list !! (n-1)a051417_list = zipWith div (tail a025547_list) a025547_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 25 2013
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu)
